{"id":489952239,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620373770,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/489952239/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"11.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string w1, string w2) {\n        int n = w1.size(), m = w2.size();\n        vector<int> prev(n + 1);\n        prev[0] = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < n + 1; i++) prev[i] = 1 + prev[i - 1];\n        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n            vector<int> dp(n + 1);\n            dp[0] = prev[0] + 1;\n            for (int j = 1; j < n + 1; ++j) {\n                if (w2[i] == w1[j-1]) dp[j] = prev[j - 1];\n                else dp[j] = 1 + min(prev[j], dp[j - 1]);\n            }\n            prev = dp;\n        }\n        return prev[prev.size() - 1];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
